column1: Funeral Mass will be held at 11:30 a.m. on Thursday
column4: at Our Lady of the Caves Catholic Church.  A Tribute to John will be held at 10:00 a.m. prior to the Funeral Mass at Winn Funeral Home.  Burial will follow in the Horse Cave Municipal Cemetery. Visitation at Winn Funeral Home on Wednesday from 2-8 p.m. and on Thursday from 8-10 a.m. until time of the Tribute.
